titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Archives of Industrial Society (AIS) Information Files, ca. 1890s-present AIS.Info.Files
titlestmt.author: Ashley Taylor.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-09-13 07:38:55 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Archives of Industrial Society (AIS) Information Files

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of Pittsburgh. Archives Service Center

did.abstract: The Archives of Industrial Society (AIS) Information Files contain ephemeral materials related to the political, social and economic history of Pittsburgh and other parts of southwestern Pennsylvania. These include brochures, fact sheets, small pamphlets and other informational publications on local organizations, religious institutions, parks, government departments/offices, etc. There is at least one folder in the Information File for each of the headings listed below. Items in the AIS Information Files are available for public use in the Archives Service Center Reading Room and may be photocopied upon request.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: Archives of Industrial Society (AIS) Information Files, [folder name], Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Archives of Industrial Society (AIS) Information Files, [folder name], Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in the information files, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from the information files without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Created by the Archives Service Center staff since 1979.
